statements: SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < safety_stock
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, safety_stock FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%'
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE current_stock BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT product_id, reorder_point, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE reorder_point > 30
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, safety_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > reorder_point ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < safety_stock ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < safety_stock OR current_stock = reorder_point ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, safety_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < safety_stock AND safety_stock > reorder_point ORDER BY safety_stock DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price, supplier_id, last_update_timestamp FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_management;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address, supplier_contact FROM supply_chain_management;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT product_name, quantity, price, supplier_name FROM inventory_tracking INNER JOIN supply_chain_management ON inventory_tracking.supplier_id = supply_chain_management.supplier_id WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supply_chain_management WHERE supplier_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price, last_update_timestamp FROM inventory_tracking WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY last_update_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_tracking WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM supply_chain_management WHERE supplier_name = 'XYZ Suppliers') ORDER BY quantity ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT warehouse_id, location FROM warehouses;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, category, inventory.quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id;

SELECT products.product_name, warehouses.location FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN warehouses ON inventory.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id WHERE warehouses.capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, item_category, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, quantity, supplier_id FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, item_category, supplier_id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, item_category, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE supplier_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory_items LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 5;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.quantity, suppliers.supplier_name FROM orders JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM inventory_items WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT warehouse_name, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND quantity > 20 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
